message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its value and value it can bring to you, I'm confident that you'll find our price of $11000 quite reasonable.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your premium product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Hi Bob, thanks for getting back to me. I understand your perspective, but I believe the value the product can bring to you is significantly higher. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and set the price at $10000.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. However, I was thinking we could do a bit better than that. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to go up to $9500. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
